/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the overall brightness of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
